vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ζιζάνιον, τό,
a weed that grows in wheat, ={αἶρα} 11, probably darnel, Lolium temulentum, [NT]. (Cf. Sumer. zizân 'wheat'.)
vocabInfos.shortDef: weed, darnel, or some other troublesome weed
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
weed, darnel, or some other troublesome weed
zizanium, darnel, spurious wheat, a plant found in Palestine, which resembles wheat both in its stalk and grain, but is worthless, Mt. 13:25, 26, 27, 29, 30, 36, 38, 40*
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: cỏ lùng; cỏ tranh; cỏ dại. Có thể từ tiếng Sumer zizān « lúa mì »
